705357f-a.text:
Lafayette Avenue, north side, east from Waverly Avenue, showing remaining brownstone houses on the block between Waverly and Washington Avenues. Beyond these is the Emanuel Baptist Church and the larger St. James Protestant Episcopal
Church, both at St. James Place.
P. L. Sperr  October 12, 1940
